text: @NYGovCuomo @realDonaldTrump THIS is what a leader looks like! Our president deflects and embarrasses the U.S. on the national stage while thousands are dying. Andrew Cuomo has stepped up and shown what a true leader looks like. We see you. #coronavirus #Cuomo2020
